snippet: MARCO--Max. Aventura, Florida June 6, 1923 - Dec. 20, 2015 Native of Boyle Heights, Los Angeles, California. Landed on Omaha Beach on D-Day June 6, 1944, his 21st birthday. For 67 years, devoted husband of Pearl Ann. Memorable and loving father of three sons David, Michael and Daniel and daughters-in-law Susan and Nina. Wonderful grandfather of Zachary, Alexander, Matthew, Alice, Jesse, Nicholas and Isabella. Founder of deMarco California Fabrics, his pride and joy. In War and Life He never quit He gave his all. 1/3
